headline: Wall Street Overcame This Year's Slowdown Predictions
summary: The 2025 slowdown foreseen by many on Wall Street never materialized in full. Tariff exemptions and a slew of trade deals have limited the inflationary effects of the highest import taxes in decades. And an artificial-intelligence arms race has triggered a capital-spending boom, propelling growth, minting millionaires—and leaving the U.

headline: 3 ETFs Warren Buffett Is Quietly Keeping in His Secret Portfolio
summary: The name Warren Buffett has become interchangeable with Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-B). But in a separate portfolio, he holds ETFs like the iShares Core MSCI EA (BATS:IEFA), Vanguard High Dividend Yield Index Fund ETF (NYSEARCA:VYM), and iShares Core MSCI International Developed Markets ETF (NYSEARCA:IDEV) in his portfolio. headline: Korea Crushes Global Benchmarks With Best Stock Rally Since 1999
summary: The Kospi Index has soared 76% this year, compared with the S&P 500’s 17% advance so far and MSCI Asia Pacific Index’s 25% gain.  The Korean benchmark’s performance, the best among major equity gauges, has been helped by chip heavyweights Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix Inc. as well as defense and nuclear firms.
